tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThirdPartyIntegration (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_name VARCHAR(255),
  api_key VARCHAR(100),
  data_exchange_mode ENUM('push', 'pull'),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE app_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT REFERENCES third_party_apps(app_id),
  data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  data_value TEXT,
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_exchange_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    detail TEXT
)
;

CREATE TABLE functionality_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_credentials(user_id),
    detail TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE third_party_applications (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  app_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  app_version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  app_description TEXT,
  integration_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  source_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  connection_string TEXT,
  api_key VARCHAR(100),
  is_active BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE data_mappings (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  mapping_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  source_table VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  destination_table VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  mapping_details JSONB,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_access (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  data_source_id UUID NOT NULL,
  access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)
